    • Field Detail

      • menuStyle

        public HIMenuStyle menuStyle
        CSS styles for the popup menu appearing by default when the export icon is clicked. This menu is rendered in HTML.

        Try it:

         •  Light gray menu background

        default:

         { "border": "1px solid #999999", "background": "#ffffff", "padding": "5px 0" }

      • menuItemStyle

        public HIMenuItemStyle menuItemStyle
        CSS styles for the individual items within the popup menu appearing by default when the export icon is clicked. The menu items are rendered in HTML.

        Try it:

         •  Add a grey stripe to the left

        default:

         { "padding": "0.5em 1em", "color": "#333333", "background": "none" }

      • buttonOptions

        public HIButtonOptions buttonOptions
        A collection of options for buttons appearing in the exporting module. In styled mode, the buttons are styled with the .highcharts-contextbutton and .highcharts-button-symbol class.

      • menuItemHoverStyle

        public HIMenuItemHoverStyle menuItemHoverStyle
        CSS styles for the hover state of the individual items within the popup menu appearing by default when the export icon is clicked. The menu items are rendered in HTML.

        Try it:

         •  Bold text on hover

        default:

         { "background": "#335cad", "color": "#ffffff" }

      • style

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> style
        Text styles for the legend page navigation.

        Try it:

         •  Legend page navigation demonstrated

      • arrowSize

        public java.lang.Number arrowSize
        The pixel size of the up and down arrows in the legend paging navigation.

        Try it:

         •  Legend page navigation demonstrated

        default:

         12

      • enabled

        public java.lang.Boolean enabled
        Whether to enable the legend navigation. In most cases, disabling the navigation results in an unwanted overflow. See also the [adapt chart to legend](http://www.highcharts.com/plugin- registry/single/8/Adapt-Chart-To-Legend) plugin for a solution to extend the chart height to make room for the legend, optionally in exported charts only.

        default:

         true

      • inactiveColor

        public HIColor inactiveColor
        The color of the inactive up or down arrow in the legend page navigation. .

        Try it:

         •  Legend page navigation demonstrated

        default:

         #cccccc

      • animation

        public java.lang.Object animation
        How to animate the pages when navigating up or down. A value of true applies the default navigation given in the chart.animation option. Additional options can be given as an object containing values for easing and duration.

        Try it:

         •  Legend page navigation demonstrated

        default:

         true

      • activeColor

        public HIColor activeColor
        The color for the active up or down arrow in the legend page navigation.

        Try it:

         •  Legend page navigation demonstrated

        default:

         #003399
